call_title: Lithos: The Future of Proof-of-Work Mining — Cheese Enthusiast (Ergo Meetup 2025)

topics.title: Lithos Introduction and Mining Pool Problems
topics.summary: Introduction to Lithos protocol and its goal to bring transparency and decentralization to proof-of-work mining pools. Discusses limitations of previous smart pools implementation on Ergo and centralized control issues.

topics.title: Centralization Issues in Mining Pools
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of how mining pools have centralized power over payments and block production, enabling potential censorship and manipulation. References tornado cash censorship on Ethereum as example of mining pool abuse.

topics.title: Non-Interactive Share Proofs (NISPs)
topics.summary: Introduction of NISPs as the core innovation allowing compression of mining work verification into small proofs stored on blockchain. Explains how NISPs use concepts from NIPoPoWs and optimistic rollups for scalability.

topics.title: Collateralized Mining and Censorship Resistance
topics.summary: Explanation of collateralization mechanism where ERG is provided upfront to enable instant miner payments while block rewards go to lenders. Enables miners to control block production and access MEV and storage rent rewards.

topics.title: Lithos Technical Architecture and Blockchain Agnostic Design
topics.summary: Technical details of Lithos protocol including comparison to existing solutions like P2Pool. Explains blockchain agnostic nature allowing Bitcoin and other cryptocurrency mining through Ergo smart contracts using Rosen bridge integration.

topics.title: NISP Verification and Anti-Fraud Mechanisms
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of how NISPs prevent cheating through mathematical proof of work and timestamp verification. Describes off-chain verification with on-chain fraud proofs and miner incentives to police fraudulent submissions.

topics.title: Testnet Launch Plans and Mining Differences
topics.summary: Announcement of testnet launch for November 2nd with details on new mining paradigm. Explains local stratum, difficulty selection by miners, and trade-offs between payment consistency and reward amounts.

topics.title: Lithos Client and Supported Mining Software
topics.summary: Overview of Lithos client development including HTML UI and Java-based stratum implementation. Initial support for Rigel Miner and NB Miner with plans to add more mining software.

topics.title: Block Production and MEV Integration
topics.summary: Details on automated block building prioritizing high-fee transactions and storage rent claiming. Discussion of future MEV implementation and ability for miners to include custom transactions without fees.

topics.title: Merge Mining and Collateral Market Dynamics
topics.summary: Discussion of merge mining compatibility and open market for collateral providers. Explains how miners choose collateral based on fees and the relationship between Lithos tokens and collateralization requirements.
